message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this is a very competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $105 is a fair offer, I'm looking for something closer to $110. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $110, so I'll offer $107.50. Can you consider that?
